name: DOA6 Pirates of the 7 Seas Costumes Vol.2 Set
detailed_description:
"Pirates of the 7 Seas Costumes Vol. 2 Set" for the characters of DOA6.
A set of 13 costumes for 13 characters.

This costume set features costumes for Kasumi, Helena, Kokoro, Leifang, Marie Rose, Phase 4, NiCO, Jann Lee, Hayabusa, Eliot, Brad Wong, Bayman, and Raidou.

Note:
- This product is included in the Season Pass 1. Be careful to avoid making redundant purchases.
- You must have the latest update installed before using this content.
- The full version of this game that is sold separately is required to use this product. Please make sure you also install the latest patch if it is required.
- You must purchase the relative characters before using this content.

supported_languages:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 （64bit）
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 or over
